elements.content: How Different Vendors Charge for Data Management

rows.cloud_platforms:

‚ùå Misaligned
rows.etl_tools:

‚ùå Misaligned

elements.content: üí° Bottom Line: Other vendors charge for volume. We charge for value. If you don't save money, you don't pay us. That's why we're the only vendor whose incentives are truly aligned with yours.

phrases: don't save money, you don't pay us

presentation_notes.opening: You asked about pricing. Let me show you how our pricing model compares to the alternatives.

table_walkthrough.pricing_model: [Point to row 1] Pricing model: We charge a percentage of your savings‚Äîperformance-based. Cloud platforms charge per-gigabyte ingested plus compute and storage. ETL tools charge per-connector plus per-gigabyte processed. Observability tools charge per-gigabyte ingested plus retention.
table_walkthrough.incentives: [Point to row 2] Incentive alignment: We make money when you save money‚Äîaligned. Cloud platforms make money when you use more‚Äîmisaligned. ETL tools make money when you add connectors‚Äîmisaligned. Observability tools make money when you log more‚Äîmisaligned.
table_walkthrough.risk: [Point to row 3] Cost if there's no value: With us, zero dollars‚Äîrisk-free. With everyone else, you pay the full bill‚Äîrisk is on you.
table_walkthrough.surprise_bills: [Point to row 4] Surprise bills: None with us‚Äîpredictable based on savings. Common with cloud platforms from usage spikes. Common with ETL tools from new connectors. Very common with observability tools from log explosions.
table_walkthrough.contracts: [Point to row 5] Contract flexibility: We do annual standard contracts, but the pilot is always free. Cloud platforms and observability are consumption-based with ongoing risk. ETL tools are annual or monthly per-connector.
table_walkthrough.total_cost: [Point to row 6] Typical annual cost for 100 terabytes per month baseline: With us, $120K to $240K‚Äîthat's a percentage of the $600K to $1.2M you saved. Cloud platforms: $600K to $1.2M in platform spend. ETL tools: $50K to $150K in connector fees. Observability: $600K to $1M in log storage.

presentation_notes.bottom_line: [Point to bottom] Bottom line: Other vendors charge for volume. We charge for value. If you don't save money, you don't pay us. That's why we're the only vendor whose incentives are truly aligned with yours.
presentation_notes.when_to_use: Use this slide when procurement asks 'How does your pricing compare?' or when CFO wants competitive context

use_case: Procurement discussions, CFO presentations, when pricing comparison is requested
